# ISmsService.SendBulkSmsAsync method

Send SMS to multiple recepients

```csharp
public Task<IEnumerable<string>> SendBulkSmsAsync(IBulkSms bulkSms)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| bulkSms | Bulk SMS to be sent |

## Return Value

Receipients whose SMS were sent successfully
